message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you.  I'm thinking of a price around $140 to start. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you reaching out.  I'm really interested in the product, but $140 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $135? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  I'm still aiming to stay closer to $130.  Would you consider $132?  It's a small difference, but it would make a big difference for me.
